### Government Tender Announcement

#### Project Title
RISO Miscellaneous Dry Canteen Items

#### Solicitation Number
21201-236382/01/A

#### Call Title
Trade Agreement: None
Tendering Procedures: All interested suppliers may submit a bid
Competitive Procurement Strategy: Lowest/Lower Bid
Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement: No

#### Project Overview

The Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is requesting a Standing Offer for the supply and delivery of Miscellaneous Canteen Items to the Inmates' Canteen at Correctional Service Canada's (CSC) Institutions located in Renous and Dorchester, New Brunswick, and Springhill, Nova Scotia.

#### Bid Submission Requirements

Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, bidders are encouraged to submit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service or facsimile instead of in-person submissions. If submitting in person, use the bid drop box.

#### Requirement

The supplier must be compliant with the requirements at Annex A and Annex B (Lists of Products) for the period from October 1st, 2022, to September 30th, 2023.

#### Delivery Instructions

Deliveries must be made to the following Institutions:

* Atlantic Institution - Renous, New Brunswick
* Dorchester Penitentiary - Medium Security - Dorchester, New Brunswick
* Dorchester Penitentiary - Minimum Security - Dorchester, New Brunswick
* Springhill Institution - Springhill, Nova Scotia

Call-ups will be made every 2 weeks, and deliveries must be provided within 1 week of ordering.

#### Evaluation Procedure and Basis of Selection

Standing Offers will be awarded to the lowest valid offer per item or group of items, meeting all mandatory requirements, if substantial savings can be accomplished.

#### Important Notice

This solicitation is part of PSPC's Contract Modernization Initiative. The standard terms and conditions for this procurement are incorporated by reference into, and form part of, the bid and contract documents.

#### Documents

The documents for this tender can be found at [link to government procurement site](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/).

#### Contact Information
